variables.tip 1: Turn off the cellphone during class
variables.tip 2: Be on time for the class.  If you cannot attend, please inform the instructor in advance and review the class lecture when you are able
variables.tip 3: Ask questions if you do not understand something, we are here to help you not judge you
variables.tip 4: Stay on top of your assignments and projects.  If you are having trouble, please reach out to the instructor for assistance
